#summary This wiki page will help you, step by step, how to use FurbSpeech API in a Java project with Eclipse IDE.

  # Create a new Java project;
  # Add the !FurbSpeech jar to the classpath;
  # Download the resources archive file by clicking [http://furbspeech.googlecode.com/files/furb-speech-rsrc.zip here];
  # If you don't have yet, create a new source folder in your project called resources or something like this;
  # Extract the downloaded zip file into your new resources folder;
  # That's it, very simple! :-)
